sentence.Network_en: I just don't want you to chastise yourself.
sentence.Network_cn: 我只是不想要你过于自责。

sentence.Network_en: My father used to chastise my brothers with whips.
sentence.Network_cn: 父亲过去常以鞭打惩罚我的兄弟.

sentence.Network_en: How can he chastise me for something he knows nothing about?
sentence.Network_cn: 他对事情不了解,怎么能责怪我 呢 !

PerfectNetExp.abs: chastisable 应惩罚的chastise 严惩chastisement 惩罚
英语专业八级词汇表_百度文库 ... chasm n. 深渊，大差别，代沟 chastise v. 严厉惩罚，遣责 chauffeur n. 司机.
...chasten v．(通过惩罚而使坏习惯等)改正、磨练chastise v．严厉惩罚，遣责chauvinism n．沙文主义，盲目爱国主义
4. 混乱，无序chastise 严责chiaroscuro明暗对照法

list.abs: we should inflict severe chastisement on criminals ., 我们应该对罪犯施加严厉的惩罚.
asking a question During the computer class , the teacher chastised one boy for talking to the girl sitting behind him .问问题计算机课上，老师批评一个男生，因为他和后边的女生说话。
they chastised the government for lacking vitality and strength .他们抨击政府软弱无能。
our government chastised the behaviors of nato ., 我国政府强烈谴责了北约的行为.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: apparently formed irregularly from the obsolete verb chaste (see chasten)

entry.def: If you chastise someone, you speak to them angrily or punish them for something wrong that they have done.

example.ex: Thomas Rane chastised Peters for his cruelty...
example.tran: 托马斯·拉纳严厉训斥彼得斯的残酷行为。

example.ex: The Securities Commission chastised the firm but imposed no fine...
example.tran: 证券委员会严厉批评了那家公司，不过没有处以罚款。

sentences.sentence: "She chastised him for his insensitive remarks"

auth_sentence.content: We should recognise his qualities, even as we chastise his excesses.
auth_sentence.res_content: We should recognise his qualities, even as we chastise his excesses.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We should recognise his qualities, even as we chastise his excesses.

auth_sentence.content: Gore can't help but breathe, and I wonder how many of us would chastise him for having children.
auth_sentence.res_content: Gore can't help but breathe, and I wonder how many of us would chastise him for having children.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Gore can't help but breathe, and I wonder how many of us would chastise him for having children.

auth_sentence.content: I'm sorry, you can have all the goofy ideas you want but don't chastise those who won't buy it.
auth_sentence.res_content: I'm sorry, you can have all the goofy ideas you want but don't chastise those who won't buy it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'm sorry, you can have all the goofy ideas you want but don't chastise those who won't buy it.

sentences.en: A boy chastised himself for a ditched pitch but was quickly soothed by his partner’s “That’s OK!”
sentences.cn: 一名男生责罚自己那糟糕的投掷，但他的配手一句“没关系！”使他很快平静下来。
